original_text: Therefore hath the curse devoured the earth, and they that dwell therein are desolate: therefore the inhabitants of the earth are burned, and few men left.
korean_text: 그러므로 저주가 땅을 삼켰고 그 중에 사는 자들이 정죄함을 당하였고 땅의 주민이 불타서 남은 자가 적도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore hath the curse devoured the earth
and they that dwell therein are desolate
therefore inhabitants of earth are burned
